        Checks that an expression is true
        Parameters:
        expression - a boolean expression
        errorMessage - the exception message to use if the check fails; will be converted to a string using String.valueOf(Object)

      • checkNulls

        @Nonnull
public static <T> List<T> checkNulls(Iterable<T> items,
                                              String message)
         Returns  items as a modifiable List that's guaranteed not to contain
 any nulls.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - with message (plus the index of the first null element) if any element in items is null
